_source.text: A better-than-usual overview of the design and execution of the special effects, "The Magic of Spiderwick!" (14:23) makes the work genuinely interesting, with comments from Waters, Tippett, Helman, Tippett Studio lead animator Michael Brunet, Tippett Studio visual effects supervisor Joel Friesch, Tippett Studio CG supervisor Russell Darling, ILM visual effects supervisor Tim Alexander, ILM visual effects art director Christian Alzmann, ILM animation supervisor Tim Harrington, and ILM digital artist lead Jean Bolte.
